title: Headhunter Nidalee Bug (Gameplay)
body: I was playing a game against Headhunter Nidalee and there was several things I noticed. For one her jumps very buggy and secondly her spear was virtually invisible. The game mode was Legend of the poro king.

replies.body: This is just Nid period, not just her skins. She's been very buggy the last few patches for opposing teams. There's already a few threads up explaining this.
